page.title: 04S.MARY'S CHURCH WHITTON CONT
page.content: church Service Costs.Baptisms Â£3,Marriage Banns Â£4,Marriage Certificate Â£2,Marriage Service Â£33,Funeral Â£36,To erect a monument in the Church yard Â£38.The Parsons salary Â£7300 per annum.The Christmas service for 53,held at 10.00pm allowing the Parson to hold further services at other Churches before Midnight.In the Church there is a beautiful mosaic floor under the "Berne Jones"stained glass window.There is a monthly Parish magazine.St. Mary's has an active Church Council who organize a summer fete,raising Â£492 this year.Every Church has its own architect,Thomas Overbury from Cheltenham checks and repairs St.Mary's every 5 years.2 services were cancelled this year 20th.Jan.and 10th.Feb. owing to ice and snow.
